channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Reactions Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Reactions Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-24723|2024-08-03T19:42:16.809Z -- unknown -- wp%20reactions%20lite
item.description: The WP Reactions Lite WordPress plugin before 1.3.6 does not properly sanitize inputs within wp-admin pages, allowing users with sufficient access to inject XSS payloads within /wp-admin/ pages.
